product_name: Finish Line Super Bike Wash - 1 Liter (33.8 oz.)
long_description: Quickly clean dirt, clay, road grime and chain soils off your bike with this easy-to-use cleaner that's safe for the environment and your bike. Three rust and oxidation inhibitors protect metal surfaces to prevent flash rusting and aluminum pitting. Five cleaning agents work together to create a high-speed cleaning system. Special anti-static agent helps minimize after-wash dust adhesion. Wash does not contain chlorinated solvents, phosphates, benzenes, citrus extracts, abrasives or napthas, which can harm components and the environment. Safe for all bike surfaces including titanium, aluminum, fiberglass, clear coat, chrome, rubber, plastic, vinyl and leather.
short_description: Quickly clean dirt, clay, road grime and chain soils off your bike with this easy-to-use cleaner that's safe for the environment and your bike.
